verses.verse: And it came to pass on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117>, that Mosheh <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH8804> Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, and the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>;

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Aharon <WH175>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> thee a young <WH1241> <WH1121> calf <WH5695> for a sin offering <WH2403>, and a ram <WH352> for a burnt offering <WH5930>, without blemish <WH8549>, and offer <WH7126> <WH8685> them before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

And unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> ye a kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering <WH2403>; and a calf <WH5695> and a lamb <WH3532>, both of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141>, without blemish <WH8549>, for a burnt offering <WH5930>;

Also a bullock <WH7794> and a ram <WH352> for peace offerings <WH8002>, to sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8800> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>; and a meat offering <WH4503> mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>: for to day <WH3117> the YY <WH3068> will appear <WH7200> <WH8738> unto you.

And they brought <WH3947> <WH8799> that which Mosheh <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>: and all the congregation <WH5712> drew near <WH7126> <WH8799> and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, This is the thing <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> that ye should do <WH6213> <WH8799>: and the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> shall appear <WH7200> <WH8735> unto you.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Aharon <WH175>, Go <WH7126> <WH8798> unto the altar <WH4196>, and offer <WH6213> <WH8798> thy sin offering <WH2403>, and thy burnt offering <WH5930>, and make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8761> for thyself, and for the people <WH5971>: and offer <WH6213> <WH8798> the offering <WH7133> of the people <WH5971>, and make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8761> for them; as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>.
Aharon <WH175> therefore went <WH7126> <WH8799> unto the altar <WH4196>, and slew <WH7819> <WH8799> the calf <WH5695> of the sin offering <WH2403>, which was for himself.

And the sons <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> brought <WH7126> <WH8686> the blood <WH1818> unto him: and he dipped <WH2881> <WH8799> his finger <WH676> in the blood <WH1818>, and put <WH5414> <WH8799> it upon the shofars <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196>, and poured <WH3332> <WH8804> out the blood <WH1818> at the bottom <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196>:

But the fat <WH2459>, and the kidneys <WH3629>, and the caul <WH3508> above <WH4480> the liver <WH3516> of the sin offering <WH2403>, he burnt <WH6999> <WH8689> upon the altar <WH4196>; as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872>.
And the flesh <WH1320> and the hide <WH5785> he burnt <WH8313> <WH8804> with fire <WH784> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>.

And he slew <WH7819> <WH8799> the burnt offering <WH5930>; and Aharon's <WH175> sons <WH1121> presented <WH4672> <WH8686> unto him the blood <WH1818>, which he sprinkled <WH2236> <WH8799> round about <WH5439> upon the altar <WH4196>.
And they presented <WH4672> <WH8689> the burnt offering <WH5930> unto him, with the pieces <WH5409> thereof, and the head <WH7218>: and he burnt <WH6999> <WH8686> them upon the altar <WH4196>.
And he did wash <WH7364> <WH8799> the inwards <WH7130> and the legs <WH3767>, and burnt <WH6999> <WH8686> them upon the burnt offering <WH5930> on the altar <WH4196>.

And he brought <WH7126> <WH8686> the people's <WH5971> offering <WH7133>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> the goat <WH8163>, which was the sin offering <WH2403> for the people <WH5971>, and slew <WH7819> <WH8799> it, and offered it for sin <WH2398> <WH8762>, as the first <WH7223>.
And he brought <WH7126> <WH8686> the burnt offering <WH5930>, and offered <WH6213> <WH8799> it according to the manner <WH4941>.

And he brought <WH7126> <WH8686> the meat offering <WH4503>, and took <WH4390> <WH8762> an handful <WH3709> thereof, and burnt <WH6999> <WH8686> it upon the altar <WH4196>, beside <WH905> the burnt sacrifice <WH5930> of the morning <WH1242>.

He slew <WH7819> <WH8799> also the bullock <WH7794> and the ram <WH352> for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>, which was for the people <WH5971>: and Aharon's <WH175> sons <WH1121> presented <WH4672> <WH8686> unto him the blood <WH1818>, which he sprinkled <WH2236> <WH8799> upon the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>,

And the fat <WH2459> of the bullock <WH7794> and of the ram <WH352>, the rump <WH451>, and that which covereth <WH4374> the inwards, and the kidneys <WH3629>, and the caul <WH3508> above the liver <WH3516>:
And they put <WH7760> <WH8799> the fat <WH2459> upon the breasts <WH2373>, and he burnt <WH6999> <WH8686> the fat <WH2459> upon the altar <WH4196>:

And the breasts <WH2373> and the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> Aharon <WH175> waved <WH5130> <WH8689> for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>; as Mosheh <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>.

And Aharon <WH175> lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> toward the people <WH5971>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> them, and came down <WH3381> <WH8799> from offering <WH6213> <WH8800> of the sin offering <WH2403>, and the burnt offering <WH5930>, and peace offerings <WH8002>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> went <WH935> <WH8799> into the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and came out <WH3318> <WH8799>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> the people <WH5971>: and the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto all the people <WH5971>.

And there came <WH3318> <WH8799> a fire <WH784> out from before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, and consumed <WH398> <WH8799> upon the altar <WH4196> the burnt offering <WH5930> and the fat <WH2459>: which when all the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> <WH8799>, they shouted <WH7442> <WH8799>, and fell <WH5307> <WH8799> on their faces <WH6440>.
